description:
Easy WhatsApp Transfer, Backup & Restore

EaseUS.ChatTrans -  Easy WhatsApp Transfer, Backup & Restore
- Transfer WhatsApp messages, images, videos, contacts, etc between iOS & Android.
- Transfer WhatsApp business between iOS & Android
- Backup WhatsApp from iPhone, iPad, Android to PC
- Restore WhatsApp backup to iPhone, iPad, Android
- Backup Kik and Viber App Data

Devices Supported
- iPhone 4s/5/5s and later series, including 15
- iPad mini2/3/4/5, iPad3/4/5/6/7, ipad Air 2,Air 3,iPad Pro and later series
- Samsung, Huawei, Xiaomi, Oppo, Vivo, HTC, LG, Sony, Motorola（New support）
